title: The Sweet Trade
description: A richly textured historical novel follows the exploits and adventures of two notorious female pirates--Anne Bonny, a one-time Southern belle whose lover, Calico Jack Rackham, leads her into a life of crime, and Mary Read, an Englishwoman forced to disguise herself as a man to make a living as a merchant sailor. 25,000 first printing.
author: Elizabeth Garrett
